-- terms , conditions -- \tThe Customer must be aware and accept that the Customer is responsible for using the Service in the service business in accordance with the laws and customs of Vietnam. You don\'t be used service to media the content of the depraved, anti-state, spamming and/or unwanted information to other organizations and individuals in the system in any form. \tUnlike a Privacy Policy, a Terms and Conditions is not mandatory under any laws or required by any app stores. However, because of the benefits discussed above, you can see why you\'d want one anyway. \tAlso, while app stores don\'t explicitly require you to have a Terms and Conditions agreement with your app, there are some direct ways that having one can help you meet other app store requirements. \tGenerally, the Terms and Conditions agreement is broader than the EULA agreement and it\'s particularly relevant for web-based mobile apps.
